-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Lexical extension for Quasi-Quotations using French-Quotes
--   
--   Translate the French-Quotes in a UTF-8 Haskell file into a
--   Quasi-Quotation that can be instantiated later on.
@package frquotes
@version 0.2.1

module Text.FrQuotes
frQuotes :: String -> String
